text_block_list.text: I brought Matikanetannhauser to the infirmary because she got injured during training.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sorry for worrying you. But it doesn't seem to be a big deal.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's get back to the course.
choice_data_list: Are you planning to run already?
Are you planning to run already?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm fine! I often get nosebleeds, fevers, or hives, but I'm confident I have twice the energy of anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Besides, I can't just rest alone while everyone else is working hard!
choice_data_list: Got it, let's do it within your limits.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Aww... I thought you might say that...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But if I don't push myself at times like this, I'll just stay ordinary forever...
choice_data_list: If something happens, you won't even be able to stay ordinary.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I understand. I'll rest properly today so I can recover quickly.
Matikanetannhauser said with a slightly disappointed look and went back to the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ugh... The spot where I got injured earlier is starting to hurt again... Maybe I got carried away...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I'm sorry... It looks like I can't do it today after all...
Matikanetannhauser said with a look of regret and went back to the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Phew... It looks like I can run at full speed!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll do my best! I'll make sure to stay within my limits, just like the trainer said! Hmph!
Matikanetannhauser trained within her limits, being mindful of her injury.
